sen.j: 小野 毛野（おの の けぬ、生年不詳 - 和銅7年4月15日 (旧暦)（714年6月1日））は、飛鳥時代後期の公卿。
sen.e: ONO no Kenu (year of birth unknown - June 5, 714) was a Court noble of the late Asuka period.
sen.cmt: 没年をグレゴリオ暦に訂正しました。
sen.e: ONO no Kenu (year of birth unknown - June 5, 714) was a Court noble in the late Asuka period.
ONO no Kenu (year of birth unknown - June 5, 714) was a Court noble in the late Asuka period.

sen.j: 小野毛人の子、小野妹子の孫。
sen.e: He was a son of ONO no Emishi, and grandson of ONO no Imoko.
He was a son of ONO no Emishi, and a grandson of ONO no Imoko.
He was a son of ONO no Emishi, and a grandson of ONO no Imoko.

sen.j: 子に小野老・小野田守がいる。
sen.e: His children included ONO no Oyu and ONO no Tamori.
His children included ONO no Oyu and ONO no Tamori.
His children included ONO no Oyu and ONO no Tamori.

sen.j: 持統天皇9年（695年）7月、遣新羅使に任ぜられ、新羅へ渡航。
sen.e: In August 695, he was appointed Japanese envoy to Shilla and sailed for Shilla.
In August 695, he was appointed a Japanese envoy to Shilla and sailed for Shilla.
In August 695, he was appointed a Japanese envoy to Shilla and sailed for Shilla.

sen.j: 文武天皇4年（700年）10月、筑紫大弐となる。
sen.e: In November 700, he became Tsukushi-no-daini (Senior Assistant Governor-General of the Tsukushi offices).
sen.cmt: 「筑紫大弐」定訳不明。用語検索の「太宰大弐」に倣って訳文のようにしました。
sen.e: In November 700, he became Tsukushi-no-daini (Senior Assistant Governor-General of the Tsukushi offices).
In November 700, he became Tsukushi-no-daini (Senior Assistant Governor-General of the Tsukushi offices).

sen.j: 大宝 (日本)2年（702年）5月、参議になる。
sen.e: In June 702, he became Sangi (councilor).
sen.cmt: 原文には (日本) とありますが、リンク先の単語が抽出されるバグのようですので、訳出しておりません。
sen.e: In June 702, he became a Sangi (councilor).
In June 702, he became a Sangi (councilor).

sen.j: 慶雲2年（705年）11月、中務省になる。
sen.e: In November 705, he became Nakatsukasa-kyo (Minister of the Ministry of Central Affairs).
sen.cmt: 原文には「中務省」とありますが、リンク先の単語のようです。ウェブで確認すると用語が「中務卿」となっており、本来はこちらの用語を使用していると思われますので、こちらを訳出しました。
sen.e: In November 705, he became a Nakatsukasa-kyo (Minister of the Ministry of Central Affairs).
In November 705, he became a Nakatsukasa-kyo (Minister of the Ministry of Central Affairs).

sen.j: 和銅元年（708年）3月に中納言になる。
sen.e: In March 708, he became Chunagon (vice-councilor of state).
In March 708, he became a Chunagon (vice-councilor of state).
In March 708, he became a Chunagon (vice-councilor of state).
On June 15, 714, he died.
On June 15, 714, he died.
On June 15, 714, he died.

sen.j: 最終官位は従三位中納言兼中務卿・勲位だった。
sen.e: His last official rank was Chunagon and Nakatsukasa-kyo of Jusanmi (Junior Third Rank), and the Third Order of Merit.
sen.cmt: 原文には「勲位」とありますが、リンク先の単語のようです。ウェブで確認すると用語が「勲三等」となっており、本来はこちらの用語を使用していると思われますので、こちらを訳出しました。
sen.e: His last official rank was Chunagon and Nakatsukasa-kyo of Jusanmi (Junior Third Rank), and the Third Order of Merit.
His last official rank was Chunagon and Nakatsukasa-kyo of Jusanmi (Junior Third Rank), and the Third Order of Merit.

sen.j: 彼の時代、小野氏は朝廷で最も高位にあった。
sen.e: Ono clan of his day held the highest position in the Court.
In his days, Ono clan held the highest position in the Court.
sen.cmt: ・In his daysの位置を変更しました。
sen.e: In his days, Ono clan held the highest position in the Court.
